articles.author: Patrick McHale, Yueqi Yang
articles.title: Columbia, Cornell, Brown Order Evacuations After Bomb Threat
articles.description: Columbia University, Cornell University and Brown University have issued campus evacuation orders amid reports of bomb threats on Sunday afternoon.
articles.content:
Columbia University, Cornell University and Brown University have issued campus evacuation orders amid reports of bomb threats on Sunday afternoon.

articles.author: Mohamed Sheikh Nor
articles.title: Suicide Bomb Targeting Western Officials Kills Five in Somalia
articles.description: A suicide bomber rammed a vehicle laden with explosives into a security convoy in Somalia next to the residence of a former president, killing at least five people and wounding more than 20 others.

articles.author: Eltaf Najafizada
articles.title: Unknown Gunmen Storm Kabul Military Hospital; Casualties Seen
articles.description: Unknown gunmen stormed Afghanistan’s main military hospital in Kabul on Tuesday and battled with Taliban fighters after setting off explosives at the entrance gate in the latest eruption of violence since the U.S. withdrew from the country more than two month…
